class_notes:
ITAL 310R:  Advanced Italian Preceptorial for ITAL 375, "Dante's Divine Comedy in English Translation"Castaldo (W 5:30-6:20PM in person)
Content: Optional Preceptorial in Italian for students enrolled in ITAL 375 "Dante's Divine Comedy in English translation". Students and Instructor will meet once a week to read and discuss Dante in Italian. Instructor's consent required.
course_description: This is a 1 credit complementary course designed to add an Italian language component to a topic class taught in English. Students might take it in conjunction with any existing topic course taught at the 300 level. Class meets once a week.
sections: Class Nbr: 5167, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 5:45-6:35p, Instructor: A. Castaldo, Status: Open
